item.title: npmモジュールのバージョンアップ - node
item.description: npm-checkを使うと対話式でアップデートできるのでわかりやすい。 # Install checking module globally. $ npm install -g npm-check # Run. # -u means "update" $ npm-check -u # Select all basically. ? Choose which packages to update. (Press <space> to select) Missing. You probably want these. ❯◯ normalize.css missing 8.0.1 https://necolas.github.io/normalize.css ◯
